thread.title: Dissatisfied customer
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Dissatisfied customer

author: Dissatisfied customer
title: Dissatisfied customer
text: My experience with frame direct was rated very satisfied. The quality of eyewear is genuine Ray Ban not fake. The prescription lenses fitted perfectly. The customer service was excellent along with delivery time. I highly recommend framesdirect as the choice of eyewear company.
